com.webfirmframework.wffweb.css

Class BorderRightWidth

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.webfirmframework.wffweb.css.core.AbstractCssProperty<BorderRightWidth>
      • com.webfirmframework.wffweb.css.BorderRightWidth
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CssProperty, Serializable, Cloneable

    public class BorderRightWidth
extends AbstractCssProperty<BorderRightWidth>
     border-right-width: medium|thin|thick|length|initial|inherit;

 The border-right-width property sets the width of an element's right border.

 Note: Always declare the border-style property before the border-right-width property. An element must have borders before you can change the width.
 Default value:  medium
 Inherited:      no
 Animatable:     yes
 Version:        CSS1
 JavaScript syntax:      object.style.borderRightWidth="5px"
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    WFF
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public Float getValue()
        gets the border-right-width in Float value. BorderRightWidth#getUnit() should be used to get the cssLengthUnit for this value.
